statements: SELECT film_id, film_name, production_status FROM films;
SELECT film_name, production_status, film_id FROM films;
SELECT production_status, film_id, film_name FROM films;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE production_status='Pending';
SELECT film_name FROM films WHERE film_id=5;
SELECT film_name, production_status FROM films
SELECT * FROM films WHERE production_status='Released'
SELECT film_name FROM films WHERE production_status='In Production' ORDER BY film_name DESC
SELECT film_name, production_status FROM films WHERE production_status='In Production' ORDER BY film_name ASC
SELECT film_name, production_status FROM films ORDER BY production_status
SELECT * FROM films WHERE status = 'Released';
SELECT title, status FROM films WHERE production_status = 'In Production';
SELECT film_id, title, status FROM films ORDER BY film_id DESC;
SELECT film_id, title, production_status FROM films WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT film_id, title, status, production_status FROM films WHERE title LIKE '%Love%' ORDER BY film_id ASC;
SELECT title, status FROM films WHERE film_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE status = 'Released';
SELECT title, new_status, update_time FROM films JOIN film_updates ON films.film_id = film_updates.film_id WHERE film_id = 2;
SELECT title, status FROM films ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE status IN ('In Production', 'Post-Production');
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, production_status FROM films ORDER BY production_status DESC;
SELECT film_id, title, status_name FROM films JOIN production_status ON films.production_status = production_status.status_name;
SELECT * FROM film_production WHERE production_id < 10;
SELECT title FROM films WHERE title LIKE 'The%' OR title LIKE '%Movie';
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, production_status FROM films WHERE production_status = 'Released';
SELECT film_id, title, status_name FROM films f JOIN production_status ps ON f.production_status = ps.status_name;
SELECT title, status_name FROM films f JOIN production_status ps ON f.production_status = ps.status_name WHERE f.title LIKE '%Harry Potter%';
SELECT f.title, ps.status_name FROM films f LEFT JOIN production_status ps ON f.production_status = ps.status_name ORDER BY f.title ASC, ps.status_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Films;
SELECT film_title, film_status FROM Films WHERE film_id = 1;
SELECT film_title, film_status FROM Films ORDER BY film_title ASC;
SELECT film_title, film_status FROM Films WHERE film_status = 'Released';
SELECT film_title, film_status FROM Films WHERE film_status = 'In Production' ORDER BY film_title DESC;
SELECT film_id, film_title FROM Films WHERE film_status = 'In Production' ORDER BY film_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Films JOIN Production ON Films.film_id = Production.film_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT Films.film_title, Status.status_name FROM Films JOIN FilmStatusUpdate ON Films.film_id = FilmStatusUpdate.film_id JOIN Status ON FilmStatusUpdate.new_status_id = Status.status_id;
SELECT * FROM Production WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-08-01' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT film_id, COUNT(*) AS update_count FROM FilmStatusUpdate GROUP BY film_id HAVING update_count > 3 ORDER BY update_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, production_status FROM films;
SELECT film_id, title FROM films WHERE production_status = 'Released';
SELECT title, review_text FROM films JOIN film_reviews ON films.film_id = film_reviews.film_id;
SELECT director_id, name FROM film_directors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, production_status FROM films;
SELECT * FROM film_actors WHERE role = 'Lead Actor';
SELECT name, title FROM film_directors JOIN films ON film_directors.film_id = films.film_id;
SELECT status_name, COUNT(film_id) AS total_films FROM production_status JOIN films ON production_status.status_id = films.production_status GROUP BY status_name;
SELECT title, rating, review_text FROM films JOIN film_reviews ON films.film_id = film_reviews.film_id WHERE rating > 4;
